academic.title: Aasik-Web-Portfolio
academic.description: As a Web Developer, this project was done as a project, which involved creating a web-based application for a service hiring. The project is named "Aasik Portfolio" and aims to link service seekers with respective service providers through a web-based application. You can explore the GitHub repository to get further details of this project by clicking the GitHub button.
